typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Contract_Type_Code as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalContractType
ValidatedDateAndNumber@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidContractType@ValidContractTyoe select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Contract_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Execution_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Termination_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Contract_Value)),not(isNull(Derived_Contract_Value)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndNumber@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Derived_Execution_Date = toDate(Execution_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Termination_Date = toDate(Termination_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Contract_Value = toDecimal(Contract_Value, 19, 4, "###,###.##")) ~> ConvertDateAndNumbers
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDateAndNumber@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Contract ID / Execution Date / Termination Date / Contract Value")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidContractType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalContractType lookup(Contract_Type == Relation_Contract_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalContractType
RelationalContractType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Contract_Type_Code = Contract_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalContractType
LookupRelationalContractType split(not(isNull(Relation_Contract_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidContractType@(ValidContractTyoe, InvalidContractType)
IsValidContractType@InvalidContractType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Contract Type Code")) ~> InvalidContractTypeErrormessage
InvalidContractTypeErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidContractType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Contract_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type_Code as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Contract_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name,
		Contract_Value,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type_Code = Contract_Type,
		Executed_By_Entity1,
		Executed_By_Entity2,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
